com.github.fge.largetext

Class LargeTextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.largetext.LargeTextFactory

  • @Immutable
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class LargeTextFactory
extends Object
    Factory to obtain LargeText instances

    With this factory, you are able to specify two essential parameters:

    • which character encoding (Charset) to use when decoding the file;
    • what window size to use when decoding.

    Sample usage:

         // Default factory
     final LargeTextFactory factory = LargeTextFactory.defaultFactory();
     // Custom factory: use UTF-16 LE for encoding and a 256 MiB window size
     final LargeTextFactory factory = LargeTextFactory.newBuilder()
         .setCharset(StandardCharsets.UTF_16LE)
         .setWindowSize(256, SizeUnit.MiB);

    The defaults are to use UTF-8 (StandardCharsets.UTF_8) as a character encoding, and a 2 MiB window size.

    See Also:
    LargeTextFactory.Builder, SizeUnit, LargeText
